objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Mystery/Detective lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using expert register
Students create original mystery themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using expert register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in expert register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with clue
shopping and consumer behavior with investigation
shopping and consumer behavior with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
